pullRequest.title: TRUNK-4830 Avoid running legacy liquibase changesets
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of what I changed
Add custom Liquibase change and refactor demo data
Please note that some changes are contained in a zip file, namely webapp/src/main/resources/liquibase-demo-data.zip.
Issue I worked on
see https://issues.openmrs.org/browse/TRUNK-4830
Checklist: I completed these to help reviewers :)

[ x ] My IDE is configured to follow the [code style]
[ x ] I have added tests to cover my changes. (If you refactored
[ x ] I ran mvn clean package right before creating this pull request and
[ x ] All new and existing tests passed.
[ x ] My pull request is based on the latest changes of the master branch.

commit.message: TRUNK-4830 add custom Liquibase change and refactor demo data

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 	 * 
 	 * This constant needs to be updated when adding new Liquibase update files to openmrs-core.
 	 */
-	private static final int CHANGE_SET_COUNT_FOR_2_1_X = 863;
